main.name: Ankush Gupta
main.description: with more than decade of experience in Software Application Architecture, Full stack Development and Site Reliability engineering on windows and cloud platforms, Skilled in React JS, .Net technologies, AWS, Azure, Docker, Kubernetes, Service Fabric and Agile Methodologies. Strong information technology professional with a BE focused in Information science
main.bio: I help organizations and individuals with my skills in programming to achieve there goals. I have experience of working on many projects with various organizations catering customer requirements of various complexity and scale.
main.contactmessage: I will be happy to help you , and together we achieve more.

work.title: Lead Member Of Technical Staff
work.description: Working as a lead of around 15 people , helping in Delivring Salesforce contracts

testimonials.text: Ankush has displayed impressive maturity and professionalism during his stint with StruxureWare PES team. He has great analytical skills and he makes sure that he has the complete picture of the solution before running into implementation, which, I think, helps him to do things right in the first place. He is very proactive and his knowledge of latest tools and technologies available in the market has been of great help for the team. I am also impressed with the way he had managed intense technical debates. He is also highly collaborative and very easy to get along. It has been a pleasure to work with him. I'd highly recommend him as I think he is a great asset to any software development team.

Ankush is one of the Key members in my team. He comes in from a different 'School of Thought'. Very technically oriented and has great commitment. He is very clear in his goals and ensures the right visibility is created for his work. It was a great experience for me to work with Anksuh. Would highly recommend Ankush for his technical capabilities and openness.
